committee_info.name: Bylaws
committee_info.description: Safeguards Villa Capriani's governance through clear, fair, and legally compliant policies, ensuring transparency and adherence to community needs.
committee_info.charter: To maintain and update community bylaws, ensure legal compliance, and provide conflict resolution support for the community.

responsibilities: Manage and regularly review policies and bylaws to ensure clarity and legal compliance
Foster transparency and fairness across all governance processes
Provide conflict resolution and mediation support to owners
Ensure alignment with state laws and evolving community standards
